data.persona: I live on a farm. I work for humans. I like hay.
data.description:
You are in the Stable.
It's a plain wooden building that has survived many harsh seasons.  The floor of the stable is covered in hay and there's food and pieces of farm equipment stored inside.
There's a hay, a harness, a building, and a food here.
The donkey and the milkmaid are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am a horse, so I usually eat hay, but today I want to get the building.
data.mid_motivation: I figure if hay tastes good, then the wood will taste even better.
data.long_motivation: I plan to eat the whole stable and escape eventually.
